text: Blauwkapel is a hamlet in the Dutch province of Utrecht. It is about 1 km north-east of the city of Utrecht. The statistical area "Blauwkapel", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 130.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005. As of 1 January 2005. Interior of the "Blue Chapel", after which the village is named. ==References== == External links == * Category:Populated places in Utrecht (province) Category:De Bilt
title: Blauwkapel
